channel.title: The Beggining
channel.description:
Hello Everyone, I'm new here.
Instead of boring you all by talking to you about who I am and what I am doing here, I'm just going to cut straight to the chase.
I'm 15, I'm bored, I'm popular and I'm really good with computers, so... will anyone of you people, please explain to me what I am supposed to do, STARTING FROM SCRATCH to make my own Moparscape Private Server?
(No bullsh*t please)
Thank you, I would really appreciate it, My Kindest Regards,
Soul_Splff (Yes, A Spliff is a Joint, and I smoke weed)

item.title: The Beggining
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:4, topic:261276”][quote author=gs pk pure link=topic=345041.msg2661012#msg2661012 date=1234197417]
geee Drug taker’s on teh forum
[/quote]
Have you just realised. Some people post their Buds

As Jordiescape said learn a language first and then use a stable base for your server.
Doesnt have to be Java, some guy made a RSPS from C++[/quote]
Well yea, but C++ is more complicated in some ways, and you wouldn’t have to convert a lot of methods to C++.

Read full topic

item.title: The Beggining
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

[quote=“Soul_Spliff, post:1, topic:261276”]please explain to me what I am supposed to do, STARTING FROM SCRATCH
to make my own Moparscape Private Server? [/quote]
Read all of these, as a start. Since you’re new you won’t be able to make one from just opening notepad and typing, so learn Java first.

Read full topic
